Title: Relates to issuance of warrants for seizures of firearms in supreme court and family court
Summary: Relates to issuance of warrants for seizures of firearms in supreme court and family court.
LawCode: Amd §§154-d, & 842-a, Fam Ct Act; amd §§240 & 252, Dom Rel L; amd §530.12, CP L; amd §212, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, the domestic relations law, the criminal procedure law and the judiciary law, in relation to issuance of warrants for seizures of firearms in cases in which orders of protection are issued in supreme court and family court
